an4.208:1: "Bhikkhus, I will teach you what is bad and what is worse than that bad. And I will teach you what is good and what is better than that good. Listen ….
an4.208:2: (1) "And what, bhikkhus, is bad? Here, someone is of wrong view … wrong liberation. This is called bad.
an4.208:3: (2) "And what is worse than that bad? Here, someone is himself of wrong view and encourages others in wrong view … he is himself of wrong liberation and encourages others in wrong liberation. This is called what is worse than that bad.
an4.208:4: (3) "And what is good? Here, someone is of right view … of right liberation. This is called good.
an4.208:5: (4) "And what is better than that good? Here, someone is himself of right view and encourages others in right view … he is himself of right liberation and encourages others in right liberation. This is called what is better than that good."
